gallery.images

Class ImageOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • gallery.images.ImageOperations

  • public class ImageOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    Operations on images like resizing and rotating as well as reading metadata in image files.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the angle stored in the jpeg file.

      • isImage

        public static boolean isImage(java.lang.String path)
        Indicates if a path refers to an image or not.
        Parameters:
        path - a path to a file
        Returns:
        true if it is an image, false otherwise.

      • getAngle

        public static ImageAngle getAngle(java.io.File jpegFile)
                           throws com.drew.imaging.ImageProcessingException,
                                  java.io.IOException,
                                  com.drew.metadata.MetadataException
        Returns the angle stored in the jpeg file.
        Parameters:
        jpegFile - file containing an image
        Returns:
        the angle, or null if not able to retrieve it from the image.
        Throws:
        com.drew.imaging.ImageProcessingException - if an image processing error occurred
        java.io.IOException - if a file error occurred
        com.drew.metadata.MetadataException - if the reading of the image metadata failed.

      • rotate

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage rotate(java.awt.image.BufferedImage originalImage,
                                  ImageAngle imageAngle)
        Rotate an image with the appropriate angle.
        Parameters:
        originalImage - the original image that needs to be rotated
        imageAngle - the image angle, may be null. In which case, the original image is returned.
        Returns:
        returns a possibly rotated BufferImage.

      • scaleImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage scaleImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage originalImage,
                                      int newWidth,
                                      int newHeight)
        Scale an image down to a new size. Keeps ratio.
        Parameters:
        originalImage - the original image
        newWidth - the new width in pixels
        newHeight - the new height in pixels
        Returns:
        a new image that is at most newWidth

      • getMetadata

        public static java.util.List<PhotoMetadata> getMetadata(java.io.File jpegFile)
                                                 throws com.drew.imaging.ImageProcessingException,
                                                        java.io.IOException
        Retrieve the metadata from an image file.
        Parameters:
        jpegFile - the image file
        Returns:
        List of PhotoMetadata
        Throws:
        com.drew.imaging.ImageProcessingException - an image processing error occurred when interpreting the image.
        java.io.IOException - an error occurred when reading the file

      • getDateTimeTaken

        public static java.util.Date getDateTimeTaken(java.io.File jpegFile)
                                       throws com.drew.imaging.ImageProcessingException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Returns the date and time when the photograph was taken, null if unable to retrieve.
        Parameters:
        jpegFile - a file containing an image.
        Returns:
        date or null if unable to determine the date when the photograph was taken
        Throws:
        com.drew.imaging.ImageProcessingException - an image processing error occurred when interpreting the image.
        java.io.IOException - an error occurred when reading the file
